jurisdiction.title: Oak Park and River Forest School District

FB64166513524DD3A8152655E40E202D.description: I can effectively and consistently express myself in a variety of styles for academic and professional audiences and purposes. (superior)

36C4E45ADB20421FAB7B1767174DA3EF.description: I can deliver a presentation for a variety of purposes in a style appropriate to any type of audience. (superior)

588753F8806D4734AD67F91B3AF24635.description: I can effectively and consistently use language for all purposes. I can take part effortlessly in any conversation or discussion. (superior)

5A49737854B14635AA714AFA6C9ED517.description: I can comprehend with ease virtually all forms of written language. (superior)

A0C2B779F462490AA303F70BA8AC292E.description: I can understand any kind of spoken language, including most accents and dialects. (superior)

E1227CA39EFE48D5BFDCC427E50676CC.description:
I can express myself with fluency and precision on concrete and some abstract topics. I can adapt my writing style according to 
purpose and audience. (high)

24A7ABF845D2479DA57E2ED8F7EC7A45.description: I can write clear, well-organized texts for a variety of audiences on concrete social and professional topics. (mid)

9C1F07304E394EF6A7E01A792C0BDF20.description: I can express ideas on a variety of topics in clear, organized texts. I can adjust my writing for some audiences. (low)

368B9E52CE834A9392E30DCD57948B51.description: I can deliver a clear and fluid presentation and appropriately respond to the audience. (high)

D63F038087B741B18CE050826C3B78ED.description: I can deliver a clearly articulated presentation on personal, academic, or professional topics. (mid)

9A9BFB9899E04E739DC031937FA35358.description: I can deliver a comprehensible presentation appropriate to my audience on a variety of topics. (low)

679D6DDAA34C4224B54E00A36A8CC05D.description: I can usually adapt my language to the situation. I can express myself with fluency, flexibility and precision on concrete and some abstract topics. (high)

05063EC93E9A4D83828230556E98BB12.description: I can communicate with fluency and flexibility on concrete social and professional topics. (mid)

80CAD3292BBD411FA6D1BBEE56127510.description: I can express myself on a range of familiar and some unfamiliar topics. I can link ideas in extended discussions. (low)

DA5637BD6A25460CB80D055E476A4B3B.description: I can understand abstract and linguistically complex texts. I can make appropriate inferences and identify literary elements. (high)

3A06CABC14374A09B497C56F4DC58644.description: I can understand long, complex texts and recognize some literary and technical styles. (mid)

8E5D735AF515491ABDD4A83B672FC80C.description: I can understand the subtleties of texts on familiar topics and information from texts on unfamiliar topics. (low)

88871F8868C54E45ADE8E486BF30A5A2.description: I can understand most spoken language and some technical discussions. I can understand some accents and dialects. (high)

1AC7BCC0AC184888898C7DFDC250682A.description: I can understand extended speech and lectures, even when somewhat complicated. I can understand most forms of media with little effort. (mid)

F49A4DBAF4954AACBD0386D16C6B5BC5.description: I can understand some extended speech on unfamiliar topics delivered through a variety of media. (low)

525CB920D033403BB1E0D40519F6744C.description: I can express ideas in detailed narratives, descriptions or explanations on familiar and some new topics. (high)

09495AC3D3A3495D9F0BC02877E7F614.description: I can summarize, describe or explain familiar topics and support my views with some details. (mid)

6EE8456F1060426EBA83B9F266D65F39.description: I can write about familiar topics and experiences in series of sentences. (low)

121BB0F32344467D9B64AA09B3077B80.description: I can present clear and detailed descriptions on topics related to my experiences and interests. I can present my viewpoint on an issue and support my opinions. (high)

A06073AE3EFB48FF817EE2B453C26F1D.description: I can connect sentences in order to describe experiences, events, and opinions. I can narrate a story and make a simple factual presentation. (mid)

C57534EA0A9A4A989A32140ECC513EE7.description: I can connect basic sentences to provide information on familiar topics. I can relate with some details, information about what I read, hear and see. (low)

E2D687B5AED44BDEA476701A150679CD.description: I can state and support my views and take an active part in discussions on familiar topics and in some complicated situations. (high)

9A7792F4541F4D9B8AB4C44D6236C34A.description: I can state my views and begin and carry on conversations on a variety of familiar topics and in uncomplicated situations. (mid)

2A1C524D04C040498A05C0817621EC5F.description: I can begin and carry on an unrehearsed conversation on a limited number of familiar topics. I can ask and answer simple questions and exchange information in highly familiar situations. (low)

3111891C3D1B4603ACA1D11F2534FA68.description: I can understand many different types of texts that contain unfamiliar vocabulary. (high)

6427C00B7F8046A99AFEC02A52282688.description: I can understand most details in texts that contain familiar vocabulary and the main idea and many details in texts that contain unfamiliar vocabulary. (mid)

5048D2C92DBB49A1ABFE30E35B5FF896.description: I can understand the main idea and many details in some texts that contain familiar vocabulary. (low)

AD864ECDCB424C5D8918C654A051BB7A.description: I can understand some extended speech on a variety of familiar and some unfamiliar topics delivered through conversations and other media. (high)

F1702221C8E94E46A906173BAED0D065.description: I can understand ideas on familiar topics expressed through a series of sentences. I can understand details expressed in conversations and through some forms of media. (mid)

867B6682EA4149629F5ECBAC375A2DB4.description: I can understand main ideas and a few details in sentences, short conversations and some forms of media. (low)

EAC4F172CC6D468F87EC07C6B4A21BE7.description: I can write simple descriptions and short messages and reqiest or provide information on familiar topics. (high)

00461B2D6BA841848D6534D4D844F2DE.description: I can provide some basic information on familiar topics in lists and simple forms. (mid)

322CCD46359B45C084FF45E89333646C.description: I can copy some characters and words. (low)

BFC370B304E34E179ADEC2B2025E1A00.description: I can use a series of phrases and sentences to provide basic information about familiar topics. (high)

F69648EF9FAA401985A56EB1EB9E488A.description: I can use simple phrases and sentences to provide information about myself, and my immediate surroundings. (mid)

6E7F21655A8544A4B2EE67DE1CC2FF71.description: I can use single words, and memorized phrases to provide information about myself, and my immediate surroundings. (low)

87BA6675C47C4909A3CA8BED03F104B9.description: I can exchange info about familiar tasks, topics, and activities.  I can handle short social interactions using phrases and sentences, but I may need help to keep the conversation going. (high)

F6DCBBE6C0F74FABA5F44759BEA7E7EE.description: I can interact with help using memorized words and phrases. I can answer simple questions on very familiar topics. (mid)

24B36986BDE8425DA3C21B3EFBFD2F1C.description: I can use single words and simple memorized phrases. (low)

10A8759D3C4D451395D0EC1E09FD8F5F.description: I can understand the main idea and some details in simple texts that contain familiar vocabulary. (high)

94825BEC007F4D75B3974AF5FB791211.description: I can understand familiar words and short, simple phrases or sentences. (mid)

111B2AE04075439AB76D70D60E720A7A.description: I can identify some works or phrases, especially those that are similar to words in my own language. (low)

AD1E67C78E804657BB1FC7E5BE1A3039.description: I can understand ideas on familiar topics expressed through phrases, short sentences, and frequently used expressions. I can understand the main point in messages and announcements. (high)

F01AB7AF79334C2EBD1AE09713D23B7F.description: I can understand some everyday words, phrases and questions about me, my personal experiences and my surroundings, when people speak slowly and clearly. (mid)

F91CBCB114D5435F918151323FA49729.description: I can understand a few familiar words.  I can understand some words that are similar to those in my own language. (low)
